entry.title: About
entry.summary:
关于

这是Loosky的个人博客，网站基于Pelican & GitHub搭建。一切从零开始。

您可以访问我的另外一个博客,那里记录了从2003年以来的所有文章，包含技术、情感、生活等方面。

一些兴趣/爱好

  • 技术方面：Linux，编程（Python & .net & C）,网络编程(PHP & ASP)
  • 研究方向：计算机网络，无线网络(WMN)，嵌入式开发
  • 平时爱好：看电影，数码产品...

entry.title: Github
entry.summary:
1. Git config --global user.name "loosky" git config --global user.email zhuquan168@gmail.com

  1. touch README

3.git add README git add .

4. ssh-keygen -C 'zhuquan168@gmail.com' -t rsa

5. git commit -m 'first commit'

6. git remote add origin https://github.com/loosky/loosky.git

error: The requested URL returned error: 403 while accessing https://github.com/loosky/loosky.git

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7438313/pushing-to-git-returning-error-code-403-fatal-http-request-failed Edit: .git/config url=https://github.com/loosky/loosky.git to url=ssh://git@github.com/loosky/loosky.git

7.git push origin master

error: failed to push some refs to 'ssh://git@github.com/loosky/loosky.git' To prevent you from losing history, non-fast-forward updates were rejected Merge the remote changes before pushing again. See the 'Note about fast-forwards' section of 'git push --help' for details. git push origin +master
